hibernate-mapping.query: select new AGLoanProductTypeItemdto ( a.AGLoanProductTypeItemId, a.ProductCode, a.SeasonCode, a.UMCode, a.SDay, a.SMonth, a.EDay, a.EMonth, a.DeadLineDay, a.DeadLineMonth, a.USERNO, a.DATE_TIME) from LOMORM00075 as a where ( a.SeasonCode =: seasonCode) and a.Active = true

select new AGLoanProductTypeItemdto( a.AGLoanProductTypeItemId, a.ProductCode, a.SeasonCode, a.UMCode, a.SDay, a.SMonth, a.EDay, a.EMonth, a.DeadLineDay, a.DeadLineMonth, a.USERNO, a.DATE_TIME, a.Active, a.TS, a.CreatedDate, a.CreatedUserId, a.UpdatedDate, a.UpdatedUserId ) from LOMORM00075 as a where (a.SeasonCode =: seasonCode)

select new AGLoanProductTypeItemdto( a.AGLoanProductTypeItemId, a.ProductCode, a.SeasonCode, a.UMCode, a.SDay, a.SMonth, a.EDay, a.EMonth, a.DeadLineDay, a.DeadLineMonth, a.USERNO, a.DATE_TIME, a.Active, a.TS, a.CreatedDate, a.CreatedUserId, a.UpdatedDate, a.UpdatedUserId ) from LOMORM00075 as a where a.Active = true order by a.ProductCode desc

select new AGLoanProductTypeItemdto( a.AGLoanProductTypeItemId, a.ProductCode, a.SeasonCode, a.UMCode, a.SDay, a.SMonth, a.EDay, a.EMonth, a.DeadLineDay, a.DeadLineMonth, a.USERNO, a.DATE_TIME, a.Active, a.TS, a.CreatedDate, a.CreatedUserId, a.UpdatedDate, a.UpdatedUserId ) from LOMORM00075 as a where a.SeasonCode = :seasonCode and a.Active = true
